properties.name: Angelini Osteria
properties.description: Posted by Puckbunny7313 Beverly Blvd, los angeles, caKnown for manning the stoves at high-end restaurants Rex and Vincenti, Chef Gino Angelini is dishing out quality Italian fare at his own place. Even the most been-there-ate-that gourmand will savor the simple, yet sublime, starters--from the paper-thin pizzas to the steamed mussels and clams bathing in a garlic-infused broth. Nonna Elvira\'s green lasagna is a dozen layers of bliss with blankets of pasta enveloping a mild cheese. Continue with a deliciously soft, moist branzino (salt-encrusted sea bass), or a pork chop sided with braised red cabbage. Desserts deserve special attention, such as a buttery mascarpone, or a scoop of vanilla gelato with a shot of steaming espresso.

properties.name: Aquabus
properties.description: Posted by Puckbunnyhornby st and seabreeze walk, vancouver, bcRain or shine, the rainbow-coloured Aquabus Ferries continuously criss-cross Vancouver\'s scenic False Creek, carrying both foot passengers and cyclists. Vancouver\'s downtown neighborhoods, parks, attractions and hotels are all within walking distance of an Aquabus.

properties.name: Engine Co No 28
properties.description: Posted by Puckbunny 644 S. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA, United StatesOpened in January of 1989, Engine Co. No. 28 is an American restaurant reminiscent of the classic grills of San Francisco and New York — mahogany booths, granite bar, Ella Fitzgerald music in the background — set in a beautifully restored 1912 Los Angeles firehouse (original architecture includes 18-foot pressed tin ceilings and red brick flooring). The restaurant\'s atmosphere is comfortable and relaxed with a staff that is both friendly and attentive.

properties.name: Father's Office
properties.description: Posted by Puckbunny 1018 montana ave, santa monica, caFather\'s Office is the home of the renowned "Office Burger." The burger has earned accolades, such as "The True Burger King" from Esquire Magazine, "the burger as art," from Los Angeles Magazine, "the Glam Burger" from the Los Angeles Times, and recently Entertainment Weekly\'s "Most Powerful Burger."

properties.name: Feenie's
properties.description: Posted by Puckbunny2563 West Broadway Vancouver Welcome to Feenie\'s - the classic Canadian bistro created by Vancouver\'s own Iron Chef Rob Feenie. Day and night, this busy Kitsilano eatery serves up luxurious comfort food favorites such as Sheppard\'s Pie with Truffle Mashed Potatoes, "Feenie" burgers topped with Foie Gras and Chocolate Banana Bread Pudding. Located minutes away from fantastic shopping and beautiful beaches, Feenie\'s is a neighborhood hangout for visitors and locals alike.

properties.name: Milano
properties.description: Posted by PuckbunnyBurnaby st and Burrard st, vancouver, bcTwo level penthouse with panoramic 270 degree views to English Bay, North Shore - Westend. Floor to ceiling glass walls. Stone slab kitchen tops, gas range, gas fireplace and custom made maple cabinetry. 2 Prkg stalls and 2 Balconies.

properties.name: Millennium Biltmore Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Puckbunny 506 S Grand Ave, los angeles, caA historic landmark, the Millennium Biltmore Hotel, Los Angeles has been home to presidents, kings and Hollywood celebrities since it opened in 1923. The hotel is centrally located in downtown Los Angeles\' business, financial and cultural district. Upon arrival you are greeted by stunning Italian-Renaissance architecture with ornate columns, vivid frescoes and grand European charm. Once home to the Academy Awards, the hotel\'s Crystal Ballroom is where the Oscar statuette was first created.

properties.name: Roy's Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Puckbunny 800 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, 90017 Roy Yamaguchi’s Hawaiian Fusion Cuisine blends fresh local ingredients with European sauces and bold Asian spices, always with a focus on seafood. Each evening you’ll find a tantalizing range of appetizers, entrées, fresh fish dishes and desserts.
